data.text:
The legendary actor James Brolin and his wife, the iconic Barbra Streisand, have a love story that resembles a classic romantic movie. Having been together since 1996, their relationship stands as a positive contrast to the frequently tempestuous world of Hollywood relationships. Here is everything fans need to know about James Brolin and his wife Barbra Streisand’s age, job, and their relationship.

Who is James Brolin’s wife in 2024?

Barbra Streisand remains the spouse of actor James Brolin as of 2024. They were married in 1998 and their union has endured ever since.

Brolin and Streisand first met in 1996 after they were set up on a blind date. Recalling their first date on the Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon in 2021, Streisand revealed she found Brolin’s hairstyle very funny. She said, “I expected a guy with a brown beard and brown, wavy hair. And I saw a guy that had all his hair cut off, no beard.”

As per People, in November 1996, James Brolin and his now-wife, Streisand appeared as a couple for the first time in public for a premiere. After that, the couple made numerous appearances at events, solidifying their relationship in the public eye. In July 1998, the two tied the knot in a small ceremony which was attended by stars like John Travolta and Tom Hanks.

The couple celebrated their 20th wedding anniversary in July 2018. Talking about his marriage with ET, Brolin said, “I do believe in counseling if anybody ever has a problem in their marriage.”

Brolin told The Talk in 2021, how he and Streisand grew closer during the COVID pandemic, saying, “We’ve literally fallen in love over this period of time.” Furthermore, Brolin also opened up to Andy Cohen about how he is his wife’s biggest fan, saying, “I just get in the car and I start playing her [music],” as per US Weekly.

What is Barbra Streisand’s age and job?

James Brolin’s wife, Barbra Streisand is 82 years old. She was born on April 24, 1942, making her two years younger than Brolin.

She is a singer, actress, songwriter, producer, and director. Her career spans over six decades and she has achieved incredible success in all these areas. She is among the artists who have won a Tony, Oscar, Emmy, and Grammy.

James Brolin and Barbra Streisand’s kids

James Brolin and his wife Streisand have no children of their own. The couple has been fulfilling their duties as loving parents for their children from previous marriages.

According to The Sun, Brolin has two sons, Josh Brolin, and Jess Brolin from his first wife Jane Cameron Agee. He also shares a daughter, Molly Brolin, with actress Jan Smithers with whom his marriage concluded in 1995. On the other hand, Streisand has a son named Jason Gould, with former husband, actor Elliott Gould.
